title: Poached Salmon with Hollandaise
ingredients: ['For the poached salmon', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Pinch of salt and pepper', '2 (150g) skinless, boneless salmon fillets', 'For the hollandaise sauce', '3 egg yolks', '1 tablespoon hot water', '225g butter, cut into small pieces', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']
